title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat & embed from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) to chat with local models, import docs, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama with prompts, model management, and REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin library for Ollama with Android support; chat, embeddings, model utils.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat interface that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and CLI for reproducible Linux/macOS installs.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API to expose Ollama chat & embeddings to web/mobile frontends.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG system with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-android
summary: Jetpack Compose Android app that chats with Ollama over local network or tunnel.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes and insert completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Bolt JS that lets teams chat with Ollama models in channels or DMs.
